html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08782022-07-14TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the VESSEL OPERATION RESTRICTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) include electric propulsion vessels in the restrictions relating to shoreline speed limit; (2) designate peace officers in the municipalities of Ivry-sur-le-Lac (Quebec), Lac-Simon (Quebec), and Vulcan County (Alberta) as enforcement officers; (3) correct the geographic coordinates, name, and description of bodies of water in Ontario and Quebec; and (4) update the name of Schedule 3 to the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0175 Publication Date: 2022-08-03
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the VESSEL OPERATION RESTRICTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) include electric propulsion vessels in the restrictions relating to shoreline speed limit; (2) designate peace officers in the municipalities of Ivry-sur-le-Lac (Quebec), Lac-Simon (Quebec), and Vulcan County (Alberta) as enforcement officers; (3) correct the geographic coordinates, name, and description of bodies of water in Ontario and Quebec; and (4) update the name of Schedule 3 to the Regulations.
